          <identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86cb0e5943cf96db0b7c55beea91117aa9a5f36b</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A model of the Rutherford and Marsden experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Modell des Rutherford und Marsden 
experimentieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un modèle du Rutherford et Marsden 
expérimentent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um modelo do Rutherford e Marsden experimentam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un modello del Rutherford e Marsden sperimentano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μοντέλο του πειράματος Rutherford και Marsden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un modelo del Rutherford y Marsden experimentan</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates an experimental set-up model of the Rutherford and Marsden experiment that uses glass marbles, card strips, and a ruler.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht ein 
experimentelles Installation Modell des Rutherford und Marsden 
Experimentes, das Glasmarmore, Karte Streifen und ein 
Tabellierprogramm benutzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre un modèle expérimental 
d'installation de l'expérience de Rutherford et de Marsden qui 
utilise les marbres de verre, des bandes de carte, et une grille de 
tabulation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra um modelo experimental da 
instalação da experiência de Rutherford e de Marsden que usa os 
mármores de vidro, as tiras do cartão, e uma régua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra un modello sperimentale di 
messa a punto dell'esperimento di Marsden e di Rutherford che usa i 
marmi di vetro, le strisce della scheda e un righello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί ένα πειραματικό μοντέλο 
οργάνωσης του πειράματος Rutherford και Marsden σπου το γυαλί
χρήσεων δίνει όψη μαρμάρου, λουρίδες καρτών, και ένας 
κυβερνήτης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra un modelo experimental de la
disposición del experimento de Rutherford y de Marsden que utiliza 
los mármoles de cristal, las tiras de la tarjeta, y una regla.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
